author: sandygao
msg: JIRA Issue #1480: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1480. Bug fix: total digits for precision decimal is t in "values are expressible in scientific notation using at most t digits for the coefficient." So for "0.003", total digits is 1, not 3 or 4.
